trans-unit.source: Derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel"></xref> class and used by ASP.NET to contain <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoice"></xref> templates.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
If a mobile control provides templated rendering features through device templates, it must create instances of each template inside a separate control of type TemplateContainer.
If a data-binding expression is in a control in a template, the `Container` variable of the expression is always of type TemplateContainer.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TemplateContainer"></xref> class.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Gets or sets a property that determines whether an additional trailing break is rendered after the control.
This break causes subsequent content to start on the next line.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an additional trailing break is rendered after the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
